                                                                        2. å–æ¨¡ï¼ˆå–ä½™ï¼š%ï¼‰

                                                                        /**
 * å…¬å¼ï¼ša % b = a - a / b * b;
 * ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š
 * -10 % 3 => -10 - (-10) / 3 * 3 = -10 + 9 = -1
 * 10 % - 3 = 10 - 10 / (-3) = 10 - 9 = 1
 */
System.out.println(10 % 3);
System.out.println(-10 % 3);
System.out.println(10 % -3);
System.out.println(-10 % -3);

System.out.println(a <= b); // false
System.out.println(a < b); // false
System.out.println(a == b); // false
System.out.println(a == b); // true

// å¯¹äº && çŸ­è·¯ä¸è€Œè¨€ï¼Œå¦‚æœç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ¡ä»¶ä¸º falseï¼Œåé¢æ¡ä»¶ä¸å†åˆ¤æ–­

                                                                        import java.util.Scanner;
public class Input {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
       /**
        * åˆ›å»º Scanner å¯¹è±¡
        * 
        */
        Scanner myScanner = new Scanner(System.in);
        
        System.out.println("è¯·è¾“å…¥å§“å");
        String name = myScanner.next();
        
        System.out.println("è¯·è¾“å…¥å¹´é¾„");
        int age = myScanner.nextInt();
        
        System.out.println("è¯·è¾“å…¥å·¥èµ„");
        double sal = myScanner.nextDouble();
        
        System.out.println("äººçš„ä¿¡æ¯å¦‚ä¸‹");
        System.out.println("å§“åï¼š" + name + "å¹´é¾„ï¼š" + age + "å·¥èµ„" + sal);
    }
}
